projectHeader.title: Pixl Dinosaur game demo
projectHeader.projectDescription: This demo introduces the `@espruino-tools/core` package with the espruino Pixl, also including the `@espruino-tools/peer` package for remote device control

details.title: Pixl peer-to-peer dinosaur game
details.description: A small demo to showcase using a mobile device to control an espruino device via a peer to peer connection.
